q_en: How many sewing tasks did Skilled Sewers complete before June 2024, and what types of products were produced for these sewing tasks?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group named "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '7' AND status = 2 AND end_time < '2024-06-01';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks completed by the "Skilled Sewers" group before June 2024

steps.sql: SELECT op.product_id, pt.description FROM order_product op JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE op.id IN (17, 18);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and types for the completed sewing tasks

steps.operation: Count the number of sewing tasks retrieved in Step2 to determine how many tasks were completed by the "Skilled Sewers" group before June 2024.
steps.results: The number of sewing tasks completed by the "Skilled Sewers" group before June 2024 is 2. This is determined from the results of Step 2, which retrieved two sewing tasks with IDs 17 and 18.
